name: Airbnb Design Language System (mobile)
description:
Airbnb is with no doubt one most well-designed products in the world. But their famous Airbnb Design Language System (DLS) isn't available anywhere.


That's why I'm on a quest to document it!


It takes time but I'm passionate, if you love it as well, don't hesitate to encourage me by offering me a cup of coffee üòÑ: https://estragon91.gumroad.com/l/ycmfvx
